mapper.select: select * from posting limit page, cnt
select * from posting where tag=#{tag} limit page, cnt
select * from posting where name=#{name} limit page, cnt
select * from posting where name=#{name} AND tag=#{tag} limit page, cnt
select * from posting where title=concat("%", #{title}, "%") limit page, cnt
select * from posting where title=concat("%", #{title}, "%") AND tag=#{tag} limit page, cnt
select * from posting where content=concat("%", #{content}, "%") AND tag=#{tag} limit page, cnt
select * from posting where content=concat("%", #{content}, "%") AND tag=#{tag} limit page, cnt
mapper.insert: insert into posting(pid, classifier, tag, title, uid, content, image) values(#{pid}, #{classifier}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{uid}, #{content}, #{image})
